column4: I installed pgplot5 via apt-get but I am not able to find the libraries in /usr/local/lib where should them have been placed?
try /usr/lib.  /usr/local/lib is used for libraries which aren't managed byt he package manager
so where can I find them?
on gnu-based systems such as most linux distributions, the version of make installed is gnu make.  on bsd variants, gmake is gnu make and make is bsd make
